issue.title: Embedded copy of urdfdom is outdated

content.raw:
I've update the code to latest 0.3.0 urdfdom and move the old collision_groups and visuals_groups members to the _array in commit  8f7233c (as well as remove the conditional code that was depending on the external urdfdom).

Things are still not compiling since we need to modify our functions to adapt them to the remove of collision_group. Mainly:

```
void ReduceVisualToParent(UrdfLinkPtr _link,
    const std::string &_groupName, UrdfVisualPtr _visual)
```
Since I think that the concept of group does not exists anymore.

I'm afraid that I don't understand the code well enough to change this without breaking things, so @nkoenig @scpeters @hsu could you please finish this? The work is in the ```update_urdfdom_0.3``` branch.
